title: How to Remove the Strong Sharp Taste or Smell from Onions

steps.title: Place sliced onions into a bowl of fresh water.
steps.content: Place sliced onions into a bowl of fresh water. Ensure that the entire contents of the bowl is immersed in water.

steps.title: Add 2 tablespoons of fine salt and mix well.
steps.content: Add 2 tablespoons of fine salt and mix well. If fine salt is not available, the rough type will do just fine. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Drain salted water from onions.
steps.content: Drain salted water from onions. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Rinse again with fresh unsalted water and drain for the second time.
steps.content: Rinse again with fresh unsalted water and drain for the second time.

steps.title: Add the onions to your salad or other dish as required.
steps.content: Add the onions to your salad or other dish as required. The onions are now ready for use if using them raw and uncooked. The salted water weakens the strength of the sulfur present in onions that gives it a strong sharp taste.

steps.title: If you don't want to soak the onions, cook the onions before using them.
steps.content: If you don't want to soak the onions, cook the onions before using them. [3] X Research source
